lines.text: Arma gravi numero violentaque bella parabam
Par erat inferior versus: risisse Cupido

entries.text: When you see an infinitive in indirect speech but don't yet know what is introducing the infinitive, try just translating it as if it were an indicative verb until you know more.
entries.author: M. Jean

entries.text: Despite the general rule that the subject of verbs in indirect speech are rendered in the accusative case, becasue of the specific verb used to introduce this indirect expression, the indirect subject here will be in the nominative.
entries.author: M. Jean

entries.text: So it's said, and snatched away one foot.
entries.author: M. Jean
